topic.title: One true religion will rule the Earth, Inshaallah
topic.body:
The blessed Islamic State will soon conquer the White House; every single of your politician and "scientist" will be publicly beheaded.  You'll be forced to convert to Islam, the religion of peace.  White race will be sterilized, everywhere because they're inherently evil.  Allah says in Torah: "We must purge evil from Israel."  Remember?

The sooner you join the only true Islamic state the better.  All praise be to Allah.

1_15CBPoeiB4i4G6NaCzccZ2e3CANLm32sgT.body: All feminazis and "LGBTs", the mythical creatures, will be publicly beheaded.  All world-controlling Jews' heads will be chopped off.  It's a warning to you, Zuckerberg.  Islamic is coming!  The Caliphate has awaken!
All praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
